attributes.action: Cancel ALL leave for MPs until consensus on Brexit terms can be agreed
attributes.additional_details:
Failure to attend and vote should result in a hefty fine for individual MPs to pay.

Maybe this will focus the minds of our MPs and help them to find a way beyond the current embarrassing impasse. 

It's time to put aside hidden agendas/personal egos and honour the commitment to represent their constituents to ensure delivery of Brexit, deal or no deal, as close to 29 March 2019 as possible.
attributes.background: The coming weeks are key to the future of our country.  A mandate should be issued that ALL leave is cancelled until a consensus on the terms for Brexit is reached.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because MPs' leave arrangements are the responsibility of political parties and not the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could sign this petition if you would like all parliamentary recess cancelled until 2020:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/252605
